channel.title: How to make a thread a manditory read on my forums
channel.description: Hey guys, not sure if this is in the right section, but I need some help with my rsps forums. I'm using SMF 2.0 and I need to know how to make one of my threads a mandatory read. Like when someone tries to browse the forums. it will say "There's a thread that the administrators want you to read before browsing the forums." I saw it on the Runeasteria forums, (Shut down private server) and ever since I wanted to figure out how to do that.

item.title: How to make a thread a manditory read on my forums
item.dc:creator: @dawgsays123 dawgsays123
item.description:
@dawgsays123 wrote:

Hey guys, not sure if this is in the right section, but I need some help with my rsps forums. I’m using SMF 2.0 and I need to know how to make one of my threads a mandatory read. Like when someone tries to browse the forums. it will say “There’s a thread that the administrators want you to read before browsing the forums.” I saw it on the Runeasteria forums, (Shut down private server) and ever since I wanted to figure out how to do that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a thread a manditory read on my forums
